definition[0]: when you are loyal to your husband, girlfriend etc, by not having sex with anyone else
example[0]: the importance of marital fidelity  (=in marriage)
definition[1]: when you are loyal to a person, an organization, or something that you believe in
example[1]: his fidelity to the company over 25 years
definition[2]: how much a film, a piece of written work etc remains unchanged from an earlier piece of work, or the facts that are known
